subject: Re: First MB session was great...
author: ecuyler
full_text:
Sounds good to me Rob.  

Jeremy


--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "dead.science" <dead.science@...> wrote:
>
> I did my first session and got a great message.
> 
> I asked if they had a message and one second later got one!  It is as
> if the message was added to or on top of the am signals, not a part of
> them.  Please listen to it and let me know.
> Rob.
>
